smimodel: Sparse Multiple Index (SMI) Models for High-dimensional Nonparametric Forecasting

Source: R/smimodel-package.R
smimodel-package.Rd

A general algorithm for estimating Sparse Multiple Index Models for high-dimensional nonparametric forecasting.

See also
